title: 1UP (feat. Profit Dinero)
lyrics:
Its whatever man
Its whatever man
Its whatever man
Yeah yeah

Man I swear that I got one up on these niggas

Bling bow put that gun up fuck these niggas

Use that second chance to make a better plan

Be a better man or its whatever man

Yeah

My dog go on and light that blunt up for my nigga

Bling bow put that gun up fuck these niggas

Use that second chance to make a better plan

Be a better man or its whatever man



I hate to see my dog through that window

Fold smell like tears how my dog get up in there

He roll for his peers now we all look like sinners

Now we outchea eating I thought we all would be at dinner (yeah)

Don't let this shit distract you from your purpose bruh

They just trying to stop what you been working for

You said that you’d buy your mama a whole crib

But now your kid ain't got no crib you doing a whole bid, shit

That ain't where you supposed to be

Thousands in the crowd that’s just what you supposed to see

I told her that you supposed to just lay low stay close to me

Let me do all the workin I know that we both could eat



Supposedly

We all should be destined for the same fate

Trying to impress all these niggas just to save face

Bigger guns, bigger whips we in the same race

Then we end up in the same place



Yeah yeah



Man I swear that I got one up on these niggas

Bling bow put that gun up fuck these niggas

Use that second chance to make a better plan

Be a better man or its whatever man

Yeah

My dog go on and light that blunt up for my nigga

Bling bow put that gun up fuck these niggas

Use that second chance to make a better plan

Be a better man or its whatever man



I hate to see my dogs stuck in they hometown

Running in place and can't make no ground

I keep telling my dog to make they own town

Put them O's down the police coming and it's over now

Yeah

Having that pack ain't where its at

Put your city on the map, and leave that bitch behind your back

Because them niggas gon' start hating all the sudden

And if they can't find you they make examples out your cousin

What the fuck is going on with niggas

Something wrong with niggas

You make that cake and can't feel safe in your own home with niggas

But if you can’t stay out that place then you belong with niggas

And you gone raise that lil baby to be a grown lil nigga



Supposedly

We all should be destined for the same fate

Trying to impress all these niggas just to save face

Bigger guns, bigger whips we in the same race

Then we end up in the same place



Yeah Yeah

Man I swear that I got one up on these niggas

Bling bow put that gun up fuck these niggas

Use that second chance to make a better plan

Be a better man or its whatever man

Yeah

My dog go on and light that blunt up for my nigga

Bling bow put that gun up fuck these niggas

Use that second chance to make a better plan

Be a better man or its whatever man



Swear my grind was hard as I hustled hard

Praying for these blessings gave it all to God

Ain’t nobody have faith in Betty's grandboy

Pain made a phone call and now I’m headed north

Its shame my own city hate to see me shine

Bitch I'm focused on these millions we need every dime

Nappy Boy to the death I'm talking dotted lines

Got everybody looking froze like a broken spine

Knew my time was coming all it took was patience

Actions speak louder than words so now they really hating

Business over bullshit when we at the occasion

And you know we bout them chips like a trip Vegas

Made it out the hood but still love Ty

1700 forever RIP to Jah

Made a vow to my son that I would never stop

And if I ever got a chance I would never flop



Man I swear that I got one up on these niggas

Bling bow put that gun up fuck these niggas

Use that second chance to make a better plan

Be a better man or its whatever man

(Yeah)

My dog go on and light that blunt up for my nigga

Bling bow put that gun up fuck these niggas

Use that second chance to make a better plan

Be a better man or its whatever man
